code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TextForm(props){const handleUpClick=()=>{let newText=text.toUpperCase();setText(newText);props.showAlert("Converted to upper case","success");};const handleLoClick=()=>{let newText=text.toLowerCase();setText(newText);props.showAlert("Converted to lower case","success");};const handleCleClick=()=>{let newText="";setText(newText);props.showAlert("Cleared","success");};const handleOnChange=event=>{setText(event.target.value);};const[text,setText]=useState("Enter text here");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{color:props.mode==='dark'?'white':'black'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Enter text to analyse below"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"form-control mb-3",value:text,onChange:handleOnChange,style:{backgroundColor:props.mode==='dark'?'grey':'white',color:props.mode==='dark'?'white':'black'},id:"myBox",rows:"8"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary  ",onClick:handleUpClick,children:"Convert to Uppercase"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary mx-2 ",onClick:handleLoClick,children:"Convert to Lowercase"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary mx-2 ",onClick:handleCleClick,children:"Clear"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your text summary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[" ",text.split(" ").length," words ",text.length-text.split(" ").length+1," characters"]}),text]});}
